document_data.name: Almaes the Alchemist's Shop
document_data.mainbody:
'''Almaes the Alchemist's Shop''' was the shop of the [[gnomish]] [[alchemist]] [[Almaestaddamir Auldcastle]] found in [[Ashabenford]], [[Mistledale]], in the late 1300s [[DR]]. Within his lab, he produced and sold a variety of alchemical reagents and completed mixtures. Among these were [[smokepowder]], [[tanglefoot bag]]s, [[sunrod]]s, and various [[acid]]s and anti-toxins.

On one occasion, Almaestaddamir made an offer to [[High Councilor (Mistledale)|High Councilor]] [[Haresk Malorn]] to build a machine capable of flinging kegs of smokepowder at [[drow]] raiders in order to better defend the dale. The latter politely declined the proposal.
